_meanings:
{@--5@} Bringing
together, concentration, 
combination, collection; {#taM veDA vidaDe nUnaM#} 
{#mahABUtasamADinA#} <ls>R. 1. 29.</ls>

{@--13@} Laying up corn
(in times of famine), storing
grain.

{@--15@} The joint
of the neck; a particular position
of the neck; <ls>Ki. 16. 21.</ls>

{@--16@} (In 

<ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech thus
defined by Mammaṭa; {#samADiH sukaraM#}
{#kAryaM kAraRAMtarayogataH#} <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; see
<ls>S. D. 614.</ls>

{@--17@} One of the ten
Guṇas or merits of style; see  
<ls>Kāv. 1. 93.</ls>

{@--18@} A religious vow or
self-imposed restraint.
